content: When should we meet in August? Please give a :thumbs_up: to as many as you want:
Sunday, August 11th, 7pm
Sunday, August 18th, 7pm
Sunday, August 25th, 7pm
None of the above, take August off

I'm inclined to take August off. My daughter is leaving for California soon and I'd like to be around as much as possible.

That said, as we've seen in the past, I certainly don't need to be there. Dan or I can update the website with the decision.
I think I'm starting to feel it too. I've got a lot on my plate.
How do others feel? Skip August? @Andrea @August Radjoe @Ista Zahn @Jason Key @Jose Lucas Cordeiro @Milan Kupcevic @Pete @Sai Dutt @Stone Chen @Yamil Suarez
Ya, I think August will be off for me too
I am around the 18th at 7 PM, and maybe the 25th at 7 PM

@Yamil Suarez do you want to run it this time? I'm also happy to give you edit access to the website.

Running it just involves showing up, really. :grinning:
I can handle showing up on the 8th if anyone else is around. I'll post here on the day off to check in
sorry, I meant to write the 18th

@Yamil Suarez awesome thanks, I just updated the website to say August 18th at 7pm.

I'm afraid I won't be there. Family reunion in Ohio. Have fun!
Oh I guess I should fire off the signals. Mastodon account, and now I've accumulated a couple direct-messages myself. They started a Signal room for me at least.
@Yamil Suarez when you post, remind me to check on these others to see who is coming.
Though Mastodon doesn't have a real RSVP situation.
But thus far I don't think anyone has shown up via that without chiming in first, other than possibly LibrePlanet.
Unless other plans sweep me up, I'll intend to be there on the 18th.
@Yamil Suarez Make sure you tell the host that you're hosting a group in case newcomers come by. I'm gonna mention that on Mastodon. The hosts always seem to know where "the group" is.

Also Dave (who is blind) liked the Mastodon post, which means he may decide to come. He has in the past interacted with Mastodon to find us. Usually he replies to the post so maybe you could just watch for any conversation: https://floss.social/@bostonopen/112949640176504359

I'm just not sure if I'll be out of cell service at the time. But I can relay things to this room if I see it.
Nice meeting y'all, I'll attend tonight.
I still plan to go to tonight, looking forward to meeting new folks tonight.
I'm going to miss tonight's - picked up a cold somewhere :(
We had 4 people last night, including two first time attendees.
Great! Sorry I missed it! I did make it back from vacation last night but it was so late (10:30pm) that I'm sure you all were long gone from Hamilton. Thanks for hosting, @Yamil Suarez!
